name: AA Casino Lucky Diamond Fruit Poker Vegas Slots - Slot Machine with Fun Prize Wheel and Blackjack

description:
AA Casino is bringing you Lucky Diamond Fruit Poker Vegas Slots.

Do you have what it takes to hit the ULTIMATE DIAMOND JACKPOT. Including popular mini games such as Blackjack and a Prize Wheel on your iPhone, iPad or iPod touch.

Double down your credits on the world's Blackjack poker table. Daily bonus spins to win free credits and awesome prizes. Play everyday to get a chance to win!

Lucky Diamond Fruit Poker Vegas Slots - Slot Machine with Fun Prize Wheel and Blackjack is a slot simulator for entertainment use only. It is free to play.
